article: Mr. White works in an office. He liked reading in bed when he was at school. It was bad for his _ and now he has near sight . _ he wouldn't want anybody else to know about it and he never wears a pair of _ . It often _ him some trouble. One winter morning he was sent to a village school on business . He got off a bus at a stop in a small town. Then he had to _ there. The road to the village wasn't smooth . He fell over some times and it _ his clothes dirty. At last he got to the village. Suddenly it began to blow and it got 27 _ . He was looking for the school while his _ was blown off. He began to run after it but he couldn't get it. He couldn't understand _ his hat ran into a house as if it had _ . And he ran into the house, _ . A woman stopped him and shouted34 _ , " _ are you running after my hen for?"
